
I18N WITH DOCFIELDS
*******************

class Cls1

   Parameters:
      **param** -- DESCRIPTION OF PARAMETER param

class Cls2

   Parameters:
      * **foo** -- DESCRIPTION OF PARAMETER foo

      * **bar** -- DESCRIPTION OF PARAMETER bar

class Cls3(values)

   Raises:
      **ValueError** -- IF THE VALUES ARE OUT OF RANGE

class Cls4(values)

   Raises:
      * **TypeError** -- IF THE VALUES ARE NOT VALID

      * **ValueError** -- IF THE VALUES ARE OUT OF RANGE

class Cls5

   Returns:
      A NEW "Cls3" INSTANCE
